reviewText: Our church kids love the contemporary songs and the motions.  We have even performed them in front of the whole church.
This is my favorite of the hillsong DVDs. As it happens, it's my daughter's favorite, too!  It is funny, relevant and a great asset to teach my little girl about a relationship with God.

I bought this dvd and also "Hillsong Kids: Tell the World" to use at our church for our children's ministry. I like the "Tell the World" one much better. For some reason, I just don't love this "Follow You" one. It has a very, very 70's feel and they are all dressed very 70's, which I think I could get past, but I just don't love the songs, either. The kids at church never ask for this one, so we never use it and I ended up just selling it. I think I am going to buy "Supernatural" or "Super Strong God" to replace it. I love Hillsong Kids dvds, and usually love their songs, but I just did not love this particular dvd they put out.

My daughter loves music and creative activities more then anything else. She has loved the previous kids videos fro Hillsong and this one is loved just as much. She sings the songs throughout the day and really just makes her happy. Great video and a great series of up beat happy songs.
It's great to be able to see music performed and the resulting worship, not just hear the cd. This is a really good product and will be helpful in my children' ministry.

I really like how this is done.  Very genuine.  Upbeat songs and tender worship songs.  Special short segments of excited young adults sharing relevant scripture. Glad I purchased it.  I use it at kids church as kids are entering the area to help them focus on the Lord.  I also use it to reinforce themes that are being taught.
my granddaughters love to sing and dance to this cd.  great on a trip
Very well done, entertaining, and God honoring...just a bit too much rock for my preference
I love Hillsong kids! Our 7 year old loved to sing and dance along with them praising  God!
Very useful as a tool for teaching children in Sunday School, these young people are very talented. The children love their songs.
My kids are 9, 6, and 4 and we all love this DVD.  Great praise and worship for kids and the whole family for that matter.  We highly recommend this purchase!

This is a great hillsong kids cd.
My son loves it so much that he puts it on repeat and listen to it everyday!
We really enjoy all of the Hillsong Kids DVDs. They do a fantastic job of incorporating teaching, worship, fun, and media and it is a blessing!
